item.title: Need help with changing welcome message
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Fistey Mr Fistey
item.description:
@Mr_Fistey wrote:

im trying to change the welcome message that comes up when you log in i have searched 'welcome message" and found it but where in it do i change it to what i want it to say?

the code is as follows…

public class WelcomeScreen extends RandomHandler {
public long run(long last) {
if (rs.altInterfaceID == Constants.INTERFACE_WELCOME_SCREEN) {
log(“Closing welcome screen”);
atInterface(Constants.INTERFACE_WELCOME_BUTTON, 4);
return random(2000, 3000);
} else
return -1;
}
}

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with changing welcome message
